mapper.sql: ID, PARENT_ID, NAME, STATUS, SORT_ORDER, IS_PARENT, CREATED, UPDATED
mapper.insert: insert into TB_CONTENT_CATEGORY (ID, PARENT_ID, NAME, STATUS, SORT_ORDER, IS_PARENT, CREATED, UPDATED) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{parentId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sortOrder,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{isParent,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

ID,

mapper.update:
update TB_CONTENT_CATEGORY
PARENT_ID = #{parentId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SORT_ORDER = #{sortOrder,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
IS_PARENT = #{isParent,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATED = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATED = #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update TB_CONTENT_CATEGORY set PARENT_ID = #{parentId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SORT_ORDER = #{sortOrder,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, IS_PARENT = #{isParent,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATED = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATED = #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
